name: invoicerr
description: Invoicerr is a lightweight invoicing and client management tool that can be self hosted. It focuses on simple creation of invoices, client lists and payment tracking, offering a clean UI for freelancers and micro businesses.
features: Simple Invoicing: Create invoices quickly with a streamlined, no-frills interface.
Client Database: Store client information and billing details in one place.
Payment Status: Track which invoices are paid, pending, or overdue.
Minimal Setup: Get started immediately without complex configuration.
Invoice History: View all past invoices and client transactions.
PDF Export: Generate PDF invoices for email or printing.
Lightweight Design: Fast performance with minimal resource requirements.
Freelancer-Friendly: Perfect for solo entrepreneurs and micro businesses.
